title: Emma Roth Profile and Activity - The Verge
content: News Writer Emma Roth is a news writer at The Verge. Her interest in tech started with the Dell Dimension 4600 her dad ordered from QVC. When she isn't behind a keyboard, Emma enjoys playing video games, going on bike rides, and gardening. The Verge is a vox media network © 2023 Vox Media, LLC. All Rights Reserved
